Home About me

Hi there.

I’m Austin Lanari, a full stack web developer looking for new opportunities. I mostly operate in Ruby and Javascript but I’m more than happy to learn any tool for the job. You can follow me on Twitter, where I tweet about comics more than anything else, and check out my LinkedIn

My ongoing projects right now are State Matters. and Eve Postmaster. Please feel free to check them out on Github.

I built this site using Github Pages and Jekyll, helping myself to a Jekyll port, Kasper, of Ghost’s default layout, Casper.
